content:
## Timeblocks

### v1

```plain text
7:00 | Wake Up
7:00 - 11:00  | Work on ReactiveEmails (finish up the Electron App)
11:00 - 12:00 | Meeting
12:00 - 13:30 | Dialect Meeting
13:30 - 13:45 | Solitude Walk
13:45 - 15:00 | Work on Dialect
15:00 - 16:00 | Meeting
16:00 - 18:00 | Work on Dialect
18:00 - 22:00 | Work on ReactiveEmails (migrate all my emails to the Reactive Emails specification); priority is to finish it
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

### v2

Woke up late; will be setting up a Precommitment with an automated consequence to wake up early soonâ€¦

```plain text
8:20 | Wake Up
8:20 - 8:30   | Morning Routine
8:30 - 11:00  | Work on ReactiveEmails (finish up the Electron App)
11:00 - 12:00 | Meeting
12:00 - 13:30 | Dialect Meeting
13:30 - 13:45 | Solitude Walk
13:45 - 15:00 | Work on Dialect
15:00 - 16:00 | Meeting
16:00 - 18:00 | Work on Dialect
18:00 - 22:00 | Work on ReactiveEmails (migrate all my emails to the Reactive Emails specification); priority is to finish it
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

### v3

First meeting got rescheduled

```plain text
8:20 | Wake Up
8:20 - 8:30   | Morning Routine
8:30 - 12:00  | Work on ReactiveEmails (finish up the Electron App)
12:00 - 13:00 | Dialect Meeting
13:00 - 15:00 | Work on Dialect (forgot about Solitude Walk)
15:00 - 16:00 | Meeting
16:00 - 18:00 | Work on Dialect
18:00 - 18:30 | Meeting
18:30 - 22:00 | Work on ReactiveEmails (migrate all my emails to the Reactive Emails specification); priority is to finish it
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

## Routines

### Morning Routine

```plain text
7:00        | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:10 | Fill out Sleep Log; Brush Teeth;
7:10        | Eat Breakfast (while working on another task)
```

### Afternoon Routine

```plain text
13:10 - 13:20 | Solitude walk around the block (time to distance myself from one project and start work on the other) 
```

### Evening Routine

```plain text
22:00 - 22:25 | Check email; Create timeblock for next day
22:25 - 22:30 | Clear desk; Plug in devices
22:30 - 22:45 | Brush teeth; Quick shower
22:45 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15         | Fill out Sleep Log; Bedtime
```

## Generic Timeblock

These entries are intentionally vague (the specifics will be listed in the specific timeblocks above), but the general order of tasks/priority of tasks is outlined in the following generic timeblock:

```plain text
7:00 - 7:10   | Morning Routine
7:10 - 13:10  | Dialect work (specific activities listed in specific timeblock above)
13:10 - 19:10 | Precommit work (specific activities listed in specific timeblock above)
19:10 - 20:40 | Side projects
20:40 - 22:00 | Buffer time
```
